item.title: Are You Making This Spelling Mistake? Find Out How to Spell 'Duvet' Now!
item.description: Introduction Are you making a spelling mistake when it comes to the word ‘duvet’? Many people are! This article will explain how to spell ‘duvet’ correctly and why it’s important to get it right. Definition of Duvet A duvet is a type of bedding that is filled with down feathers, wool, or synthetic fibers. It is usually covered by a removable cover, and it is used as an alternative to a blanket or comforter.
